page.title: 19INDUSTRIES IN BRORA 2
page.content: BRORA HIGH SCHOOL IS THE ONLY SCHOOL IN BRORA, EXCEPT FOR TORDALE WHICH IS FOR HANDICAPPED PEOPLE. THE DISTILLERY MAKES CLYNELISH WHISKY AND OTHER KINDS OF DRINKS. IT SENDS THE DRINKS ALL OVER THE HIGHLANDS. THERE IS A SMALL SURGERY IN BRORA. IT HAS A WAITING ROOM, A DENTIST, A BABY ROOM AND AN EXAMINING ROOM. THERE ARE TWO DOCTORS. THEY ARE CALLED Dr MACDONALD AND Dr BETTS-BROWN. THE DENTIST COMES IN ABOUT ONCE A WEEK. THERE ARE A LOT OF SHOPS IN BRORA FOR SUCH A SMALL VILLAGE. THEY MAKE QUITE A LOT OF MONEY. MOST THINGS THAT ARE NEEDED WOULD BE ABLE TO BE BOUGHT IN BRORA.
